comments:
I have a problem with eclipse 20020214 while everything is working properly
under 20020115.

I'm developing EJB application. Java based client (with Weblogic 6.1)
I try to get home interface of the stateless EJB bean.

the "standard" line
   NSDictHome dictHome = (NSDictHome) PortableRemoteObject.narrow(tmp,
NSDictHome.class);

hangs under new eclipse release when debuging
it does not hung when application is lstarted without debugging
it does not hung with 20020125

Task manager shows zero activity (I work under win2000 prof)

Under 20020312 also hangs
help !

-----
Can you attempt your debugging on the latest integration build?

If not, can you do a dump of the current state of the threads when you hang?

To achieve this launch eclipse with something like the following:
C:\Debugger\0305\eclipse\eclipse.exe -debug -data c:\stuff\0109 -vm
c:\jdk1.3.1_01\bin\java.exe
(the "java.exe" of the -vm arg being the important part)

In the DOS window, hit CTRL-BREAK and then you can post the stack dumps to a
bugzilla report against the offending party.

Thanks
Darins
-------
